So I have BPD and I encourage my partner to call me out on my BS. When I was in a really unhealthy state I would lash out and anything she said made me more belligerent and in a vile rage. What they say is not personal. I would not own up to my actions or ever apologize. There have been times she has said I have said or done something that I just donâ€™t remember at all. Itâ€™s important to listen to the person with mental illness but do not enable them. Sometimes when Iâ€™m getting a little difficult to deal with we will take some time apart/ just a few hours or so and when we are both calm we will talk it out, that can really help and itâ€™s awesome for healthy communication.
